articles.author: Yahoo News
articles.title: Donald Trump has worst day yet in NY civil fraud trial as underling's scribbled note ties him to conspiracy
articles.description: In testimony Tuesday, Jeffrey McConney linked Trump directly to the fuzzy math.
articles.content:
The Trump civil fraud trial is now in its eighth week in New York.
The defense called Trump's former spreadsheet czar, Jeffrey McConney, to testify.
McConney confirmed he scribbled "DJT to get final review" on an allegedly fraud-filled document.
Dona... [7375 chars]

articles.author: The Australian Financial Review
articles.title: Biden can’t spin his way to re-election
articles.description: To prevent a second term of Donald Trump, Democrats must accept that what is going wrong is their basic proposition, not the framing or messaging of it.
articles.content:
Instead, more out of inertia than calculation, the party is set to put a man who looks each and every one of his 81 years through the kind of gruelling nationwide campaign that lockdowns spared him in 2020.

articles.title: Trump’s Big Advantages as the Election Year Unfolds
articles.description: From the rules on winning GOP delegates to the weighting of the Electoral College, the Republican front-runner benefits—even as he claims the cards are stacked against him
